title: Ep. 80: A Discussion of the Five Love Languages
description:
This Very Special Episode is devoted to a discussion of "The Five Love Languages," a fascinating framework about how people best experience love. Get in touch @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/80; 774-277-9336.

itunes:subtitle: Included: Liz and Gretchen reveal their own love languages.
